name: GetTrelloNotification
description:
Retrieve detailed Trello notification information by ID.

Use this tool to obtain information about a specific Trello notification. Call this tool when you need to retrieve detailed data for a notification using its unique identifier.

parameters.name: notification_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Trello notification you want to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The ID of the notification

parameters.name: board_fields_list
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of board fields to include.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of board [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

parameters.name: card_fields_to_include
parameters.description: Specify `all` or a comma-separated list of card fields to include, such as `id`, `name`, or `due`.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of card [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

parameters.name: include_notification_fields
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of notification fields to include, such as 'id', 'unread', or 'type'.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of notification [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

parameters.name: include_member_fields
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of member fields to include in the response.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of member [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

parameters.name: member_creator_fields
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of member fields to include the member object of the creator.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of member [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

parameters.name: organization_fields
parameters.description: Specify `all` or a comma-separated list of organization fields (e.g., `id`, `name`) to include in the response.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of organization [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

parameters.name: include_board_object
parameters.description: Include the board object in the response if true.

value_schema.description: Whether to include the board object

parameters.name: include_card
parameters.description: Specify True to include the card object.

value_schema.description: Whether to include the card object

parameters.name: include_display_object
parameters.description: Set to true to include the display object with the results.

value_schema.description: Whether to include the display object with the results

parameters.name: include_entities_object
parameters.description: Include the entities object in the notification results. Set to true to include, false to exclude.

value_schema.description: Whether to include the entities object with the results

parameters.name: include_list_object
parameters.description: Include the list object in the notification data if set to true.

value_schema.description: Whether to include the list object

parameters.name: include_member_object
parameters.description: Include the member object in the notification details if set to true.

value_schema.description: Whether to include the member object

parameters.name: include_creator_member
parameters.description: Set to true to include the member object of the creator in the response.

value_schema.description: Whether to include the member object of the creator

parameters.name: include_organization
parameters.description: Set to true to include the organization object in the response.

value_schema.description: Whether to include the organization object
